Jayanth Prathipati

About Me

Hi, I'm Jayanth! I'm an aspiring Product Manager and a current masters student at Carnegie Mellon's Human Computer Interaction Institute. Before joining CMU, I was a Computer Science student and UX Researcher at Virginia Tech, a Software Developer at Element 84, and an indie mobile developer.

I like wearing many hats and I love to live at the intersection of business, design, and development. After my first year at Virginia Tech, I stumbled into Human Computer Interaction and Human-Centered Design and have loved it's approach in building the best product for your users. I've learned how to lead interdisciplinary teams of designers and developers and I've helped create some awesome products. I'd love to bring my approach to your company.

Check out my portfolio

MeterMaid

Envisioning a crowd-sourced on-demand parking service

ScottyChat

Helping prospective CMU students make an educated decision on their future

MindMapper: a investigation into bringing insight to EEG Devices

Understanding how to help people understand their focus and attention throughout the day

Jobs: A look into Data Viz and Machine Learning

Use Machine Learning to find deep insights into a software developer's job search
